A Hero Lives.description: If you control no face-up monsters: Pay half your LP; Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Elemental HERO" monster from your Deck.

Call of the Haunted.description: Activate this card by targeting 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon that target in Attack Position. When this card leaves the field, destroy that monster. When that monster is destroyed, destroy this card.

Elemental HERO Stratos.description:
When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can activate 1 of these effects.
●Destroy Spells/Traps on the field, up to the number of "HERO" monsters you control, except this card.
●Add 1 "HERO" monster from your Deck to your hand.

Mirror Force.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Destroy all your opponent's Attack Position monsters.

Monster Reborn.description: Target 1 monster in either player's GY; Special Summon it.

Mystical Space Typhoon.description: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.

Raigeki.description: Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.

Supply Squad.description: Once per turn, if a monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect: Draw 1 card.
